title: Game Crash
body: Whenever I try playing a game right after champion select i always get the league logo and then a message saying the game crashed or I lost connection to the internet when i never do. Ive tried to research it and have tried most solutions but nothing works. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Okay, so 2 things we can try and see if this works. 

Try Riots connection KB first: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't work you can try the Crash KB and see if that works: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

I have had to use both of these things at one time or another and they have worked for me. So give them a whack. I'll be on for a bit so if you're still needing help message back.
